rows.label: qev092301_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, Hope? Got a minute?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Certainly! What can I do for you?
Got something on your mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Kind of. Dunno if you've heard,
but there's been a string of BLADE disappearances lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0004
rows.name:
The third case just happened,
and...an odd commonality has emerged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0005
rows.name: The three victims that have disappeared so far...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0006
rows.name:
are Hans, Elliot, and Trish.
They were all regular clients of yours, weren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh no![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0008
rows.name: But yes, I suppose they did come by for advice fairly often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Listen, Hope, I want to respect your client privilege,
but if you know anything...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0010
rows.name: I'm sorry, but I've been leaving so much to Ornella lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0011
rows.name: My other missions have taken me out of the city a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0012
rows.name: Now that you mention it, I don't see Ornella around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0013
rows.name: Yes, she was feeling under the weather, unfortunately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0014
rows.name:
I see. Well, tell her I send my best.
And if you do hear anything, let me know, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0015
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0016
rows.name: I'm sorry, but can I ask you for a favor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0017
rows.name: Would you mind if we looked into this case?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092301_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hope that you're on it.

rows.label: qev092301_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev092301_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Hope that it's not your job.

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0018
rows.name: Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hearing that people close to me are vanishing is...
It brings up memories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0020
rows.name: I'm afraid I wouldn't be able to focus on much else right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0021
rows.name: R-right, of course. Sorry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Hearing that people close to me are vanishing is...
It brings up memories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0023
rows.name: I'm afraid I wouldn't be able to focus on much else right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev092301_SEL0031
rows.name: Press Hope for details of her past.

rows.label: qev092301_JNK0040
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev092301_SEL0041
rows.name:
Cheer Hope up by assuring
her that things will work out.

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0024
rows.name: It's not something I like to bring up, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0025
rows.name:
I was an orphan. When I was young,
I was taken in by a church.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0026
rows.name:
The priest there was wonderful.
He became a father and a mentor to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0027
rows.name:
One day, he walked out the door like normal and...
well, later they found him dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0028
rows.name: I was inconsolable. I just shook, and wept, and prayed, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0029
rows.name: And I don't think I can bear that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0030
rows.name:
That's why I want to resolve this case
as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0031
rows.name: You're always so kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0032
rows.name: It's funny...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0032_2
rows.name: Whenever you cheer me on like this, it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0033
rows.name: It reminds me of when I was living with my father.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0034
rows.name:
Whenever I was sad, he'd appear with
a cup of hot cocoa in hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0035
rows.name: Then he'd say just what I needed to hear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0036
rows.name: So I'm going to do whatever it takes to solve this case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0041
rows.name: I suppose we should ask around first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092301_MSG0042
rows.name:
Let's see what the rumor mill says
about the folks who disappeared.[ST:wait ]
